languages.text: "Наблюдение осквернения, свершенного над мануфакторумами Кьявы Гамма порождает в моей когнитивной цепи... непродуктивные сигналы. Инициирую запуск мантры умиротворения и митигации духовного износа".

"Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."
languages.original_text: "Наблюдение осквернения, свершенного над мануфакторумами Кьявы Гамма порождает в моей когнитивной цепи... непродуктивные сигналы. Инициирую запуск мантры умиротворения и митигации духовного износа".

languages.text: “基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂生产了大量亵渎之物，正在生成针对此现象的观察报告……我的认知回路中出现了无效信号。开始念诵抚慰祷文，减轻精神恶化状态。”
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

traits.locale_text: “基亚瓦伽马星的制造工厂生产了大量亵渎之物，正在生成针对此现象的观察报告……我的认知回路中出现了无效信号。开始念诵抚慰祷文，减轻精神恶化状态。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Observer la profanation des manufactorums de Kiava Gamma génère... des signaux contre-productifs dans mon circuit cognitif. Initialisation d'un mantra de pacification et de mitigation de la détérioration spirituelle. »
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

traits.locale_text: « Observer la profanation des manufactorums de Kiava Gamma génère... des signaux contre-productifs dans mon circuit cognitif. Initialisation d'un mantra de pacification et de mitigation de la détérioration spirituelle. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Observar la profanación sufrida por los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma genera... señales poco productivas en mis circuitos cognitivos. Iniciando un mantra de pacificación y mitigación del deterioro espiritual».
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

traits.locale_text: «Observar la profanación sufrida por los manufactorums de Kiava Gamma genera... señales poco productivas en mis circuitos cognitivos. Iniciando un mantra de pacificación y mitigación del deterioro espiritual».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場を侵した冒涜行為を観測すると…私の認識回路に無駄な信号が発生する。精神劣化を抑制・軽減する真言を開始」
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマの聖工場を侵した冒涜行為を観測すると…私の認識回路に無駄な信号が発生する。精神劣化を抑制・軽減する真言を開始」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Beobachtung der Entweihung der Manufactorien von Kiava Gamma generiert in meinen kognitiven Schaltkreisen ... unproduktive Signale. Initiiere ein Mantra der Befriedung und der Mitigation spirituellen Verfalls."
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."

languages.text: "Kiava Gama'daki manufaktorumlara yapılan hürmetsizliği gözlemlemek... Bilişsel devrelerimde verimsiz sinyaller üretiyor. Sakinleşme ve ruhsal bozunumu hafifletme düsturu başlatıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Observing the desecration perpetrated upon the manufactorums of Kiava Gamma is generating... unproductive signals in my cognitive circuitry. Initiating a mantra of pacification and mitigation of spiritual deterioration."
